current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Reclamation Wastewater and
		  Groundwater Study and Facilities Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior
		  to participate in the City of Hermiston, Oregon, water recycling and reuse
		  project, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced the
			 following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Energy and Natural
			 Resources

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act/s:1656

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater
			 Study and Facilities Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act

header.#text:
City of Hermiston, Oregon, water recycling
				and reuse project

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, in cooperation with the City
				of Hermiston, Oregon, is authorized to participate in the design, planning, and
				construction of permanent facilities to reclaim and reuse water in the City of
				Hermiston, Oregon.
shall not exceed 25 percent of the total cost.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act/s:61_/ss:a

text.#text:
The Federal share of the costs of the project described
				in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall not provide funds for
				the operation and maintenance of the project described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act/s:1657/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by
			 inserting after the item relating to
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 2 of the
			 Reclamation Projects Authorization and Adjustment Act of 1992
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Reclamation Projects Authorization and Adjustment Act of 1992/s:2
Reclamation Wastewater and Groundwater Study and Facilities Act/s:1656
